EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Pivotal: The way the future gets built
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Our mission at Pivotal is to transform how the world builds and runs software. Leveraging a platform, tools and methodology approach that supports lean application development principles, organisations and governments can reduce costs, increase innovation and build great quality software.
Our Software: Our cloud-native platform, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, enables developers to spend more time writing code and operators to improve security and uptime. Pivotal Greenplum, our MPP data platform, provides a layer of advanced analytics that can be leveraged to refine the app experience.
Our Services: At Pivotal Labs, our strategic services offering, we leverage extreme programming, user-centred design and lean principles to help establish lasting change within your organisation and create exceptional applications.
Learn More About Pivotal: - Watch the Video: Introducing Pivotal: https://content.pivotal.io/videos/pivotal-company-overview - Read the Data Sheet: Pivotal Overview: https://content.pivotal.io/datasheets/pivotal-overview - Watch the Video: Pivotal Labs Down Under: https://content.pivotal.io/videos/pivotal-labs-culture-down-under
I trust these resources will help you make transformation real for your organisation.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
